name: Kooperationen
goal:
Kooperationen er arbejdsgiver- og interesseorganisation for kooperativer og socialøkonomiske virksomheder i Danmark, og varetager medlemmernes interesser i forhold til rammevilkår for virksomhedernes muligheder for vækst og udvikling - og for den størst mulige anerkendelse af virksomhedsmodellens særlige
til bærdygtig samfundsudvikling og inklusion
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Single market, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives: Social business - social economy - sustainable growth - small buisness act, cooperative development
